requirements.title: Right to be Forgotten
requirements.description: Users must be able to request deletion of all their data.
requirements.action: Implement a 'Delete Account' feature that wipes database records.

requirements.title: Data Portability
requirements.description: Users must be able to download their data.

requirements.title: Consent Management
requirements.action: Add a cookie banner with 'Reject All' option.

HIPAA.description: Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (US)

requirements.title: PHI Encryption
requirements.description: Protected Health Information must be encrypted at rest and in transit.
requirements.action: Enable AES-256 for DB and enforce TLS 1.2+.

requirements.title: Access Logging
requirements.description: All access to PHI must be logged.
requirements.action: Implement comprehensive audit logs for all data access.

requirements.title: Incident Response Plan
requirements.action: Create and test an Incident Response Plan.

requirements.title: Change Management
requirements.description: Changes to production must be reviewed.
requirements.action: Enforce Pull Request reviews and CI/CD pipelines.

requirements.title: Asset Inventory
requirements.description: Maintain an inventory of all information assets.
requirements.action: Create a dynamic list of all servers, DBs, and repositories.

requirements.title: Access Control Policy
requirements.description: Limit access to information and information processing facilities.
